description:
"I love the gym," Marc told us. "I got bit by the metal bug when I was a teenager." He's 25 now and he spends 2 to 4 hours in the gym every day. "Right now I'm about 230," he said. "I'm getting ready for a competition in a few months. Soon."
Now sometimes when you get these really big guys, their dicks look small in comparison (or they are just small). That is definitely not the case with Marc!
This dude has a huge cock that looks huge even on his big frame. One thing that I thought was very funny - Marc told us his girlfriend is a "tiny little thing." Makes you wonder how he can stick that big thing inside her!
title: Marc
